data.features: Responsive grid layout, theme switcher, mobile first approach
data.description: This is a simple project I made long ago to learn how to use grid and make a switch button between light and dark mode
data.title: Social Media Dashboard with theme switcher

text.html: Social-media-dashboard-with-theme-switcher-master is a simple site, build with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. The site offers mobile and desktop viewport to navigate it in optimal way. This project is based on FrontEnd Mentor challenge
